subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Pistons are the N.B.A.’s tortoises, while Danny Ainge, with the fans and the news media hot on his trail, turned the Celtics into a hare.
snippet: The Pistons are the N.B.A.’s tortoises, while Danny Ainge, with the fans and the news media hot on his trail, turned the Celtics into a hare.
